cz.fi.muni.pb138

Interface XmlToLog4jConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlToLog4jConverterImpl

    public interface XmlToLog4jConverter
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    xstefank

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void convert()
      Method converts loaded input XML file to log4j properties format,
      void convert(String filename)
      Method loads and validate the input XML file and converts it to it's log4j properties representation
      void convertAndSave(String inputFileName, String outputFileName)
      Method loads and validates input XML file, converts it to it's log4j properties representation and saves it to the file specified
      void load(String filename)
      Method loads the log4j data from the XML file, it is also responsible for the validity of the input
      void saveTo(String filename)
      Method saves the converted data to the desired file

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load(String filename)
        Method loads the log4j data from the XML file, it is also responsible for the validity of the input
        Parameters:
        filename - path to the desired XML file
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is any problem opening / validating the input XML file

      • convert

        void convert()
        Method converts loaded input XML file to log4j properties format,
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is no data loaded to be converted

      • convert

        void convert(String filename)
        Method loads and validate the input XML file and converts it to it's log4j properties representation
        Parameters:
        filename - path to the desired XML file
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is any error opening / validating the input XML file

      • saveTo

        void saveTo(String filename)
        Method saves the converted data to the desired file
        Parameters:
        filename - path to the file where the properties will be saved, if the file exists, it will be overridden, otherwise it will be created
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there are no properties converted
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no writing right to the desired directory or the directory does not exists

      • convertAndSave

        void convertAndSave(String inputFileName,
                    String outputFileName)
        Method loads and validates input XML file, converts it to it's log4j properties representation and saves it to the file specified
        Parameters:
        inputFileName - path to the input XML file
        outputFileName - path to the desired output file
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is any problem opening / validating the input XML file or if there is problem writing / creting the output file
